title: Open `status.app` links

labels.name: E:Desktop New Share URL Format
labels.description: Implementation of the new share URL link format and other deep link associated issues

milestone.title: 0.15.5 - Stabilizing release
milestone.description:
A point milestone where we focus the Messaging and Communities team 100% on bug fixing, stabilisation, reliability and finishing any unfinished items from 0.15  

**1.  Fix bug and stabilise Communities and Messaging functionality**

**2.  Reduce size of community description metadata**
- better compressions, less duplication

**3. Use data sync layer (or other mechanism) to improve community description reliability**
- Every time a new user joins the community, the Control Node updates and signs the description.
- Random back off to stop it being too chatty 

**4. Complete profile showcase backend**
- The long-delayed profile showcase backend!  We have the UI on the desktop ready to go for this feature, and Mobile is going to need the backend for this feature as well, so let's try to get it done in 0.14 [#11081](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/11081)


--- Wallet ---

- Improved handling of community minted tokens: Community Asset and NFT designs for Asset screens
- Token visibility management
- Minor updates to Asset screens
- Continue work on WalletConnect integration
- Database re-encryption flows

body:
### Description

That issue about to new link formats, universal links and deeplinks.

Depends on:

- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/10851
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/10852
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-go/pull/3855
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/7957
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/9549
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/8027
- [ ] https://github.com/vacp2p/rfc/pull/602
- [ ] https://github.com/vacp2p/rfc/pull/600
- [ ] https://www.figma.com/file/Nt3KJ8AXm0VPpIRLxaHnw0/Sharing-for-Mobile
- [ ] Have a QA test the Epic as a whole

### Acceptance Criteria

- Make sure that all links open the app in the correct locations (link to community should open the community, links to accounts should open the user profile and so on)
- Make sure that ways like universal links or deep links on all supported platforms opens the app in the current location
